divs: sighting details3 red lights in a triangle form in the sky \ very bright.... they would blink to white then back to red... no noise just hoovered till they went out into the cloud cover...
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Westerville

Summary: 3 Red triangle lights observed for about 10 Minutes..
